content.author: Leon
content.body:
稍微涼一點點

就這麼一點…

content.author: Leon
content.body: Fruit丨vinegar 要暴雨才會涼= =

content.author: Fruit丨vinegar
content.body:
Leon

怎麼還不打算開冷氣呢

雖然現在還沒到熱呢
7月才是夏天的壓軸

content.author: Leon
content.body:
Fruit丨vinegar 窩知道阿

墊錢尼幫忙出ㄇ==

content.author: Leon
content.body: Fruit丨vinegar 算ㄌ吧= =

content.author: Fruit丨vinegar
content.body:
Leon

為什麼

content.author: Leon
content.body: Fruit丨vinegar 電費好像還要漲的樣子 再來窩門家用電量算多ㄅ= =

content.author: Fruit丨vinegar
content.body:
Leon

真的嗎？ 電費平均多少呀

content.author: Leon
content.body: Fruit丨vinegar ㄅ知道= =
